questions.explanation: The number 10 is often associated with perfection, like in the expression obtenir la note parfaite de dix sur dix (to get the perfect score of ten out of ten).

questions.question: How do you say
questions.explanation: Using hyphens in quatre-vingt-dix-neuf helps avoid confusion with individual numbers. Without hyphens, it could be interpreted as quatre (four), vingt (twenty), dix (ten), and neuf (nine) all separate.

questions.question: How do you say
questions.explanation: Hyphens are placed between all the words that make up a number, regardless of its value. This simplified rule has been in effect since 1990.

questions.question: How do you say
questions.explanation: Mille (thousand) is an invariable noun, meaning it remains in its singular form regardless of the context or the quantity it represents. It never takes a plural ending.

questions.question: How do you say
questions.explanation: Million s'accorde (agrees) in number when it is used after a number greater than one. This means that the word takes the plural form millions when preceded by a number like deux (two), trois (three), quatre (four), etc.

questions.question: How do you say "80"?
questions.explanation: The word vingt (twenty) is written in the plural form only in the number quatre-vingts (four-twenties).

questions.question: How do you say "5 billion"?
questions.explanation: Milliard follows the standard pluralization rule for common nouns and has an -s at the end when referring to more than one billion.

questions.question: How do you say "25%"?
questions.explanation: Pour cent means "per hundred" or "percent" and it indicates that the value is a proportion of a larger quantity, in this case, 100.

questions.question: How do you say "200 ou 210 euros"?
options: A. Deux cents ou deux-cent-dix euros ?
B. Deux cent ou deux-cent-dix euros ?
C. Deux cents ou deux-cents-dix euros ?
D. Deux cents ou deux-cents-dix euro ?
questions.correctAnswer: A. Deux cents ou deux-cent-dix euros ?
questions.explanation: Cent does not have an 's' if it is followed by another number.

questions.question: How do you say "les 12 coups de minuit" ?
options: A. les drouze coups de minuit
B. Les douze coups de minuit
C. les douces coups de minuit
D. les douzze coups de minuit
questions.correctAnswer: B. Les douze coups de minuit.
questions.explanation: The number 12 is invariable (does not have a plural form).
